messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Books on CD
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/17/2004 11:21:46 PM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Hi, have any of you heard of books on CD?  I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/17/2004 11:21:46 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
Hi, have any of you heard of books on CD? I would like to get some
childrens books for my daughter to listen to in the car but we only
have a CD player.<<<<

All the Harry Potter books are available on CD. Jim Weiss sells MANY on CD.
Check out the library. As for "on the road"----The Cracker Barrel has its own
library and theyy can be dropped off at any Cracker Barrel.

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
